item.title: Jimmy Carter's state funeral to be held Jan. 9 at Washington National Cathedral
item.description: The funeral for former President Jimmy Carter, who died on Sunday at the age of 100, will be held on Jan. 9 at Washington National Cathedral.

item.title: How American presidents have planned their own funerals
item.description: Jimmy Carter’s funeral will feature an interstate choreography of grief, ceremony and logistics that is characteristic of state funerals
